Folks without a Prime membership can dodge the shipping by checking out with items over $35 in the cart. Also, don’t forget to enter promo code 7YMQD9TT during checkout to see the discounted price. This universal travel adapter launched not too long ago at $70, then quickly dropped to $40 before settling around $50. Today’s offer takes 50% off that going rate, knocking $25 off the price. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this universal travel adapter, and it’s now going for $7.50 less than its previous low and mention from last month. Head below for more details.

VPNs are an essential tool for anyone concerned about data security, but finding a reliable, secure network at a price you can afford is easier said than done — especially if you have multiple devices to consider. If you’re still looking for that perfect-world VPN, FastestVPN could be exactly what you need. Your lifetime subscription can cover as many as 15 phones, TVs, laptops, and more with fast, privacy-enhancing, data protecting service. Right now, you can get unlimited data use with a lifetime subscription to FastestVPN PRO for just $29.97, a discount of 95% on the $600 regular price.

By way of its official Amazon storefront, Govee is offering up to 29% off its three sizes of Neon Rope Lights 2 with Matter, with its 9.8-foot model starting at $49.99 shipped. This is the smallest of the three options (next to the 16.4 and 32.8-foot models) that usually fetches $70 at full price, where it’s spent most of 2025 for non-Prime members, while regularly offering Prime-exclusive discounts to this rate, and occasional falls lower to $47. While we have seen it go as low as $42 in the past, today’s deal comes in as the second-best price of the year, saving you $20 off the going rate. You’ll find the 16.4-foot model down at $89.99 shipped right now, while the 32.8-foot model has fallen to $129.99 shipped.
